project.name: Common Lisp
project.description: The Gentoo Common Lisp Project handles Common Lisp related packages in the Gentoo package tree.

longdescription.p: The Gentoo Common Lisp Project handles Common Lisp related packages in the Gentoo package tree. This includes Common Lisp implementations, applications and libraries. The project will also maintain Common Lisp unrelated ebuilds assigned to the common-lisp herd.

project.plannedproject: An overview of supported Common Lisp implementations and libraries in Portage.
Documentation on the internals of the Gentoo Common Lisp supported implementations and libraries.
Answers to miscellaneous questions not covered in the Overview or User Guide.
